title: Recognise
snippet: Uncovering the hidden patterns and influences that shape societal structures.
description: Recognition involves identifying key social, environmental, and economic dynamics within communities, focusing on understanding underlying influences that affect urban life. By learning to 'see' the deeper structures at play, planners and designers can develop more insightful approaches to urban development.
literature: Seeing Like a State by James C. Scott
The Urban Revolution by Henri Lefebvre
The Art of Seeing by Aldous Huxley
